name: KJV_FearNot
title: Knowing therefore that they are no gods, fear them not,
description: Knowing therefore that they are no gods, fear them not,

name: KJV_FearNot
title: There is no fear in love; but perfect love casteth out fear: because fear hath torment. He that feareth is not made perfect in love.

name: KJV_FearNot
title: Fear them not therefore: for there is nothing covered, that shall not be revealed; and hid, that shall not be known.

title: Say ye not, A confederacy, to all them to whom this people shall say, A confederacy; neither fear ye their fear, nor be afraid.

name: KJV_FearNot
title: And now do ye not believe meis not the king great in his powerdo not all regions fear to touch him?

name: KJV_FearNot
title: Whoso feareth the Lord shall not fear nor be afraid; for he is his hope.
description: Whoso feareth the Lord shall not fear nor be afraid; for he is his hope.

name: KJV_FearNot
title: For now they shall say, We have no king, because we feared not the LORD ; what then should a king do to us?

name: KJV_FearNot
title: And he would not for a while: but afterward he said within himself, Though I fear not God, nor regard man;

name: KJV_FearNot
title: By this ye may know that they are no gods: therefore fear them not.
description: By this ye may know that they are no gods: therefore fear them not.

name: KJV_FearNot
title: Whereby they are known not to be gods: therefore fear them not.
description: Whereby they are known not to be gods: therefore fear them not.

name: KJV_FearNot
title: It is then by no means manifest unto us that they are gods: therefore fear them not.
description: It is then by no means manifest unto us that they are gods: therefore fear them not.

name: KJV_FearNot
title: And Moses said unto the people, Fear not: for God is come to prove you, and that his fear may be before your faces, that ye sin not.

name: KJV_FearNot
title: Then would I speak, and not fear him; but it is not so with me.

name: KJV_FearNot
title: Thou shalt not curse the deaf, nor put a stumblingblock before the blind, but shalt fear thy God: I am the LORD .

name: KJV_FearNot
title: Now therefore fear ye not: I will nourish you, and your little ones. And he comforted them, and spake kindly unto them.

name: KJV_FearNot
title: And the LORD said unto him, Peace be unto thee; fear not: thou shalt not die.

name: KJV_FearNot
title: Concerning propitiation, be not without fear to add sin unto sin:
description: Concerning propitiation, be not without fear to add sin unto sin:

title: Be strong and of a good courage, fear not, nor be afraid of them: for the LORD thy God, he it is that doth go with thee; he will not fail thee, nor forsake thee.

title: With whom the LORD had made a covenant, and charged them, saying, Ye shall not fear other gods, nor bow yourselves to them, nor serve them, nor sacrifice to them:

name: KJV_FearNot
title: And fear not them which kill the body, but are not able to kill the soul: but rather fear him which is able to destroy both soul and body in hell.

name: KJV_FearNot
title: Go not forth into the field, nor walk by the way; for the sword of the enemy and fear is on every side.

name: KJV_FearNot
title: Riches and strength lift up the heart: but the fear of the Lord is above them both: there is no want in the fear of the Lord, and it needeth not to seek help.

name: KJV_FearNot
title: Fear ye not therefore, ye are of more value than many sparrows.
description: Fear ye not therefore, ye are of more value than many sparrows.

name: KJV_FearNot
title: Upon earth there is not his like, who is made without fear.
description: Upon earth there is not his like, who is made without fear.

title: Fear not the imaginations against thee, let not the incredulity of them trouble thee, that speak against thee.

name: KJV_FearNot
title: He shall cast lightnings, and who shall not fear? He shall thunder, and who shall not be afraid?

name: KJV_FearNot
title: And he could not answer Abner a word again, because he feared him.
description: And he could not answer Abner a word again, because he feared him.

name: KJV_FearNot
title: Thou shalt not rule over him with rigour; but shalt fear thy God.

title: The Lord hateth all abomination; and they that fear God love it not.

title: And send thy fear upon all the nations that seek not after thee.
description: And send thy fear upon all the nations that seek not after thee.

name: KJV_FearNot
title: They are not humbled even unto this day, neither have they feared, nor walked in my law, nor in my statutes, that I set before you and before your fathers.

name: KJV_FearNot
title: And of whom hast thou been afraid or feared, that thou hast lied, and hast not remembered me, nor laid it to thy hearthave not I held my peace even of old, and thou fearest me not?

name: KJV_FearNot
title: Wherefore now let the fear of the LORD be upon you; take heed and do it: for there is no iniquity with the LORD our God, nor respect of persons, nor taking of gifts.

name: KJV_FearNot
title: Only rebel not ye against the LORD , neither fear ye the people of the land; for they are bread for us: their defence is departed from them, and the LORD  is with us: fear them not.

name: KJV_FearNot
title: Now Absalom had commanded his servants, saying, Mark ye now when Amnon's heart is merry with wine, and when I say unto you, Smite Amnon; then kill him, fear not: have not I commanded yoube courageous, and be valiant.

name: KJV_FearNot
title: Distrust not the fear of the Lord when thou art poor: and come not unto him with a double heart.

name: KJV_FearNot
title: God shall hear, and afflict them, even he that abideth of old. Selah. Because they have no changes, therefore they fear not God.

name: KJV_FearNot
title: Menstruous women and women in childbed eat their sacrifices: by these things ye may know that they are no gods: fear them not.

name: KJV_FearNot
title: For that they hated knowledge, and did not choose the fear of the LORD :

title: Be not wise in thine own eyes: fear the LORD , and depart from evil.

title: Fear not, daughter of Sion: behold, thy King cometh, sitting on an ass's colt.

title: They sacrificed unto devils, not to God; to gods whom they knew not, to new gods that came newly up, whom your fathers feared not.
